sentence.Network_en: There is a backlog of repairs and maintenance in schools.
sentence.Network_cn: 对各学校的修缮和维护工作积压了一堆。

sentence.Network_en: We are faced with a backlog of orders we can't deal with.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们面对一大堆未交付的订单. (在英国指担心订货积压不易脱手,又“无奈”意;在美国指生意兴隆,有 “ 踌躇满志”意)

sentence.Network_en: It will take a month to clear the backlog of work.
sentence.Network_cn: 要花一个月的时间才能清理完积压的工作.

list.abs: 产品订单（product backlog）是整个项目的概要文档。产品订单包括所有所需特性的粗略的描述。
冲刺订单（sprint backlog）是大大细化了的文档，包含团队如何实现下一个冲刺的需求的信息。任务被分解为以小时为单位，没有任 …
backer 票据担保人，财务支持人backlog depreciation 欠提折旧backlog order reporting 未交订货报告
1. 未交订货报告backlog order 未交货订单back pay 欠付工资

entry.tran: 积压的事情；未完成的工作
entry.def: A backlog is a number of things which have not yet been done but which need to be done.

example.ex: There is a backlog of repairs and maintenance in schools.
example.tran: 对各学校的修缮和维护工作积压了一堆。

means.word_mean: 1. an accumulation of jobs not done or materials not processed that are yet to be dealt with (especially unfilled customer orders for products or services)
2. large log at the back of a hearth fire
3. something kept back or saved for future use or a special purpose

auth_sentence.content: One reason is the thinning backlog of new deals.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: One reason is the thinning backlog of new deals.

auth_sentence.content: This has added to the backlog in the visa process.

auth_sentence.content: It has a backlog of three thousand ideas.

means.word_mean: 积压未办之事,积压的工作；没交付的订货

sentences.en: A huge backlog of work had built up.
sentences.cn: 一大堆工作积压了起来。

sentences.en: After her summer vacation,she has got a huge backlog of work to do.
sentences.cn: 暑假休假以后,她手头有许多积压的工作要做。

sentences.en: It will take a month to clear the backlog of work.
sentences.cn: 要花一个月的时间才能清理完积压的工作。

sentences.en: We are faced with a backlog of orders we can’t deal with.
sentences.cn: 我们面对一大堆未交付的订单。(在英国指担心订货积压不易脱手，又“无奈”意；在美国指生意兴隆，有“踌躇满志”意)

sentences.en: Investment is needed to reduce the backlog of repairs.
sentences.cn: 需要投资来減轻积压的维修工作。
